title: La Hardalle Chambres et Tables d'Hotes
description: La Hardalle is a vegetarian b&b with mini-camping at nearly 800 feet above see level in Plainfaing in the High Vosges. Enjoy walks with beautiful views towards the Parc des Ballons des Vosges and over the Rhine Valley in the other direction. Serves vegetarian meals with fresh ingredients; vegan upon request. Non-guests may dine here with reservation only.
